title: Drawing, "Oak Tree Trunk, Leaf, Acorn", February 1936
medium: Brush and black wash, graphite on cream paper
signed: Signed on verso, ink ink: Design by / E. McKnight Kauffer / Feb. 1936
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: An advertisement poster depicting a tree trunk with truncated limbs and an oak leaf; abstract acorn below; half black and half white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oak Tree Trunk, Leaf, Acorn", February 1936.
February 1936. Brush and black wash, graphite on cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-875.
